_source.text: [288] In particular, firing children who are found to be working in hazardous occupations is not an effective strategy to address child labor.The U.S. Department of Labor observes, "When children are in or entering the worst forms [of child labor] because a better alternative is not known to the family, the consequences of a legal ban on child labor in the worst forms may actually be detrimental because it makes a limited set of choices even smaller."

_source.text: A big reason to want to stay is because the nucleus we have here is only going to get better and if our chance (to win) isn't going to be this year, then it sure as hell is going to be the next year.

text: A big **reason** to want to **stay** is **because** the nucleus we have here is only going to get **better** and if
our chance (to win) isn't going to be this year, then it sure as **hell** is going to be the next year.
